alert.note: Alert for Cache; Davis; Morgan; Rich; Salt Lake; Summit; Utah; Wasatch; Weber (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:45PM MDT until July 17 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Weber County in northern Utah... Southeastern Cache County in northern Utah... West central Rich County in northern Utah... Northern Wasatch County in northern Utah... Eastern Salt Lake County in northern Utah... Eastern Davis County in northern Utah... Morgan County in northern Utah... Western Summit County in northern Utah... North central Utah County in northern Utah... * Until 730 PM MDT * At 644 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Weber State University to near Daniel, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Provo, Sandy, Ogden, Layton, Murray, Bountiful, Farmington, Park City, Morgan, Coalville, Hill Air Force Base, Heber City, Orem, Draper, Roy, Pleasant Grove, Cottonwood Heights, Clearfield and Midvale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 304 and 339. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 119. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 119 and 178. US Route 40 between mile markers 0 and 28. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 0 and 14. Mirror Lake Highway between mile markers 0 and 17. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cache; Davis; Morgan; Rich; Salt Lake; Summit; Utah; Wasatch; Weber
